snippet: The Yankees tied the game at 3-3 on two walks and two hit batsmen before Detroit sealed the victory on a sacrifice fly in their half of the ninth by Omir Santos.
abstract: Detroit Tigers defeat New York Yankees, 4-3.
lead_paragraph: The Yankees tied the game at 3-3 on two walks and two hit batsmen before Detroit sealed the victory on a sacrifice fly in their half of the ninth by Omir Santos.

headline.seo: Tigers Top Yankees’ Rally With One of Their Own
headline.main: Tigers Top Yankees’ Rally With One of Their Own in Bottom of Ninth
headline.print_headline: Tigers Top Yankees’ Rally With One of Their Own in Bottom of Ninth
